blog.description:
Ask me anything, reply as a character, how i feel about them, any headcanons, anything.
ASK/REQUEST RULES: ill do about any major jojo character from parts 1-3, bnha, any major Hetalia character, but mostly America, and any of my characters. (Slaipherchite, orgon, yuwei, Klondike, palete, Petrafiction, and fefe.) I wont take inappropriate requests including bad words. I live with a strict parent and i would get in HUGE trouble.

blog.name: yoshinoritagi
blog.title: Yoshi
blog.description: Requests are currently open.

body:
Group Therapy Class

Therapist: Okay, now I want you all to use the provided crayon and paper to draw your happiest memory in life.

Shigaraki: My what now

Tabe: (draws him sucking up a donut like Kirby)

Kurono: (barely able to draw thanks to his wrist being stabbed, but still shakily draws Chisaki) Can i go see Kai now? Y'all said if I agreed to this that I could see Kai afterwards, please I just wanna see him—

Therapist: I’m beginning to question if separating each of you into three-person groups was a good idea or not.

[In the other room]

Therapist’s assistant: Okay, now for this exercise—

Giran: Exercise? I thought you said extra fries! (Painful laughter as he cries into his bandaged hand)

Chisaki: I would like a different sheet of paper, mine has been dirtied by the touch of a heathen, these arms need not be sullied by someone as filthy as he. Metal or not, they’re too good for him.

Dabi: Okay so maybe I forgot to wash my hands once or twice, maybe I scratched my nuts, maybe i—

[Screaming is heard through the whole facility]

Therapist: I wonder how the other groups are doing….

blog.title: ao3feed-BakuDeku

Katsuki Bakugou / Izuku Midoriya fanfics on Ao3
Blog created April 2, 2019. No fics before this date will be archived.
This page is still under construction

summary: so, i guess i love you?
title: so, i guess i love you?
description:
by lovebunroki

katsuki and izuku pine over each other for their third year of yuei, finally getting closer and closer, just like when they were children. izuku gets piercings, katsuki is surprisingly cuddly, and they both learn that a lot has happened in the time that they cut ties. join the two idiots as they flirt absentmindedly, and still manage to get underneath the other’s skin.

Words: 1454, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku, Todoroki Shouto, Ashido Mina, Kirishima Eijirou, Kaminari Denki, Sero Hanta, Uraraka Ochako, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku
  • Additional Tags: Mutual Pining, Pining Bakugou Katsuki, Soft Bakugou Katsuki, Cute Midoriya Izuku, Sassy Midoriya Izuku, BAMF Midoriya Izuku, Bakusquad (My Hero Academia), Embarrassed Bakugou Katsuki, Midoriya Izuku is a Dork, Bottom Midoriya Izuku, Top Bakugou Katsuki, Friends to Lovers, Reminiscing, Tongue Piercings, Bakugou Katsuki Has A Crush, Tsundere Bakugou Katsuki, Bakugou Katsuki is Bad at Feelings, Pining Midoriya Izuku, Ashido Mina is a Good Friend, Minor Ashido Mina/Kirishima Eijirou

title: Opening Soon!!
body:
My merch shop will be opening on Etsy soon!!! Please follow me on whatever corresponding social media you prefer to always see updates and when new merch is available!! I will occasionally mention things here, but most of my activity will be on my Twitter and Instagram! (Facebook is mostly for my older family that wants to see… ╮(╯∀╰)╭)

Why follow my shop’s social media?

  • You’ll get all the info on:
    • New Merch
    • Release Dates
    • Pre Orders
  • Exclusive sneak peeks
    • I don’t post the art of the merch until they are ready to be released, but there will be the occasional little peek!
  • Alerts about:
    • Sales!
    • Bundles!
    • Clearance!
    • Giveaways!

Also, I will always be listening! (*´∀`*) If there’s something that you would love to see, don’t be shy, feel free to give me suggestions for future merch!! You can contact me on any of my social media accounts, or email me at sarahcaiaartshop @ gmail.com

Now, simply click the below link for each social media to follow me! I’m so excited for this journey and to have you all come along with me!

Twitter @ SarahCaia_Art

Instagram @ SarahCaiaArtShop

Facebook @ SarahCaiaArtShop

title: The Invisible Girl
description:
by Sonamae

Toru is a bright ray of sunshine! At least she pretends to be. Right up until Bakugo Katsuki catches her crying in the kitchen.

Words: 12531, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 1 of The Extra’s Club

  • Categories: Gen, M/M

blog.name: punchingbagdeku
blog.title: bnha hcs & scenarios
blog.description: um I write I guess 😌✊

summary:
It was a normal day at UA high school. Chitter chatter bumbled in the air, invading ears, especially for Momo Yaoyorozu
 Her...
body:
• It was a normal day at UA high school. Chitter chatter bumbled in the air, invading ears, especially for Momo Yaoyorozu
  • Her head was throbbing, Aizawa had pushed them to the edge, as usual. While she was very much grateful for the encouragement, she was exhausted
  • It seemed like perverted minds never falter, as Mineta ‘accidentally’ brushed against her calf. Momo, too drained to even pay attention to the gesture, grabbed an apple from the tray next to her
  • She was running late anyway, she didn’t have time to pay attention to annoying creatures like him. Her group of friends were waiting for her, already sitting at the table
  • Momo felt a shudder going all the way down from her head to her toes. Mineta was now behind her, on his toes clamping his hands on the skin on her thigh
  • Maybe… if I let it happen this once…he’ll never do it again…
  • From the sidelines, Monoma Neito squinted his eyes at the scene
  • He wondered if he should do something, or keep quiet? Was it consensual? His eyes traveled to Momo’s face, and the look of horror immediately answered his question
  • But… she’s in class 1-A no? Should I even help her?
  • Yes. It shouldn’t matter.
  • It all happened in a flash, for a split second, the blonde glared at the short purple haired male, his blue vibrant eyes piercing into his very soul, before snatching his apple juice from his tray and promptly dumping it on his head. All the while maintaining eye contact.
  • The normally loud lunch line when deathly quiet all eyes on a flustered Momo, a soaking wet Mineta, and a cunning Monoma. You could practically hear a pin drop. Mineta interrupted the silence
  • “What was that fo-“
  • “I knew class 1-A were scum, but not on this level.” Monoma says, loud and clear, his voice wavering through the empty air
  • “I’m not sure a hero like you would be accepted in Japan.”
  • “One thing I’m sure of,” he asserted while grabbing the “future hero” quite roughly by his uniform, and lifting him high in the air, staring deep into his perverted eyes
  • “You won’t be going anywhere playing the role of a hero if you don’t learn to respect woman.”
  • Momo eyes widened, in non verbal gratitude, as Mineta loosened himself away from Monoma’s grip and scurried away to an unknown location, and Monoma smirked and muttered something degrading under his breath
  • The brunette exhaled, and smiled at the blond
  • “T-Thank you,”
  • A light pink dusted his cheeks
  • “J-Just goes to show that class 1-B has good morals.”
  • Starting that day, Monoma Neito and Momo Yaoyorozu developed a wholesome friendship, and they make sure to keep in touch, despite Monoma’s bitchy attitude towards Momo’s designated class
